description: A CLI written in Go language that writes git commit messages or do a code review brief for you using ChatGPT AI (gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4 model) and automatically installs a git prepare-commit-msg hook.
summary: A CLI written in Go language that writes git commit messages or do a code review brief for you using ChatGPT AI (gpt-3.5-turbo, gpt-4 model) and automatically installs a git prepare-commit-msg hook.
author: codegpt
